description: Handle length: 13, Type of steel: Yasuki white steel #2 laminated with soft steel.Light weight, one hand axe designed for splitting firewood and clearing bushes.
Gotoku Kanna means plane with 5 uses. As smoothing (not final), both sides of rabbet, and both side rabbets.

Let us start the list with one of the basic tools in the world of woodworking: the Chisel. It is a sharp angled piece of steel with a handle for carving or cutting wood.
